name: vipWarningTemplate
rule:
return [[ warningTemplate: ''' VIP Expiration Warning Good morning, ${sponsorName}:

Thank you for being a Sponsor in our VIP System.
This is a courtesy reminder about that the individual listed below and your
continued sponsorship of their VIP affiliation with USF.

This individual's affiliation will end upon reaching the expiration date and will no
longer be able to access USF resources:

<% templateData.groupBy {"${it.gid}-${it.created_vipid}"}.values().each { group -> group.each { persons -> %> <%="" %><% } %> <% } %>
FirstName LastName Expiration Date Group
${persons.fname}${persons.lname}${persons.expiration_dt}${groupName}


If there is a business reason for which the individual needs to retain the VIP
affiliation, please FORWARD this notice to IT-Security@usf.edu for their review.
Within the request, please provide the business reason for the VIP affiliation
request, including their current, ongoing relationship with your department and
USF.
Also, please explain the work the individual is doing while
they are associated with your department, and the systems and resources the
individual is using.

We appreciate your time and assistance in ensuring only authorized persons have
access to USF services and resources, thus protecting the information contained
therein.

If you have any questions, please contact USF-IT Security for more information.

Thank you.

VIP System Owner
USF --Information Security
''']]
